content.heroIntro: Welcome to MAJESTIC PARADISE, an exceptional residential development by renowned developer GMA located in the charming pueblo of Bigastro, Alicante. This stunning collection of 2-bedroom apartments and penthouses represents a unique opportunity to own a modern home on Spain's sought-after Costa Blanca at prices 40% below comparable island markets. With just 3 units available and prices starting from €174,900, MAJESTIC PARADISE combines contemporary design with genuine value. Each property features premium finishes, generous living spaces of 61-80m², and access to world-class amenities including championship golf courses, Blue Flag beaches, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. The development is strategically positioned for both primary residence buyers and savvy investors seeking strong rental returns, with weekly rental potential of €800. Set for completion on October 1st, 2026, MAJESTIC PARADISE offers the perfect blend of lifestyle, investment potential, and Mediterranean living that has made Bigastro an increasingly popular destination for international property buyers seeking authentic Spanish living without compromising on modern comfort.

locationSection.intro: Bigastro is a picturesque pueblo nestled in the heart of Alicante's interior, offering an authentic Spanish lifestyle while remaining perfectly connected to world-class coastal amenities. This established community has evolved into a thriving destination for international buyers seeking genuine value and character combined with modern conveniences. The pueblo benefits from a well-developed infrastructure, excellent healthcare facilities including a regional hospital just 30 minutes away, and strong English-speaking support networks. Bigastro's location provides the perfect balance: far enough inland to offer exceptional property values and a genuine local community experience, yet close enough to beaches, golf courses, and major services to ensure daily convenience. The area has experienced consistent property appreciation, with values rising 8% year-on-year, demonstrating strong market fundamentals. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, second home, or investment property, Bigastro's established international community and proven rental market make it an increasingly attractive choice for discerning buyers.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. The Costa Blanca remains one of Europe's most desirable property markets with excellent climate, comprehensive healthcare, outstanding beaches, and exceptional value. The region attracts international buyers from across Europe seeking both permanent residence and investment opportunities. Bigastro specifically offers excellent value with strong appreciation trends.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain with minimal restrictions. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should consult with a Spanish lawyer to understand any specific requirements. Most international buyers use specialized legal services to navigate the purchase process smoothly.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs including: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). Your total acquisition cost typically ranges from 8-15% above the property price. We recommend discussing the complete cost structure with our advisors.
